content.text:
# Shinwar District

Shinwar is a district in Nangarhar Province, Afghanistan. It is on the main highway from Jalalabad to the Torkham border crossing. Its population, which is 100% Pashtun was estimated at 40,147 in 2002, of whom 16,000 were children under 12. The district centre is the village of Shinwar.
References
*[http://www.aims.org.af/afg/dist_profiles/unhcr_district_profiles/eastern/nangarhar/shinwar.pdf UNHCR District Profile], dated 2002-05-14, accessed 2006-07-24 (PDF).
External links
*[http://www.aims.org.af/maps/district/nangarhar/shinwar.pdf Map of Shinwar district] (PDF)
